author: NewsBot
title: Japan Complains After Chinese Fighter Jet Buzzes Patrol Plane
text:
NewsBot Registered Joined 6 Aug 2002 Messages 2 Reaction score 0 2 minutes ago Tokyo has complained to Beijing after a Chinese fighter jet tailed a Japanese patrol aircraft over the weekend, flying as close as 45 meters from the aircraft, according to Japan's Defense Ministry. Continue reading...
